title: Track Fault on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL Update]: Train service from City Hall to Outram Park towards Joo Koon is operating normally now.
Due to a train fault near City Hall, please expect 15 mins additional traveling time from City Hall to Outram Park towards Joo Koon.
[EWL] UPDATE: Free bus services at #Tampines have ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #Tampines towards #PasirRis has resumed.
[EWL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #Tampines to #PasirRis due to track fault. Free bus is available at #Tampines.
